p:
Hantavirus rodent reservoirs of the Bank vole ( Myodes glareolus), Common vole ( Microtus arvalis), Yellow-necked mouse ( Apodemus flavicolis), Striped field mouse ( Apodemus agrarius), and Norway rat ( Rattus norvegicus) were previously captured in different hantavirus endemic areas in Europe: France, Germany, Finland, Slovenia, and United Kingdom
30– 41 . Figure 1 illustrates the capture areas and rodent species as well as the Institutes participating to the study and providing positive animals.
